comments:
Description:
Error occurs in error log Show View when start BIRT(v20070306-0630)
Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070306-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1, Start today's build v20070306-0630
2, Open Error Log Show View
Expected result:
No Errors in Error Log
Actual result:
The proxied handler for "'org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.actions.ImportCSSStyleAction' could not be loaded" error message occurs
Error log:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Plug-in "org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui" was unable to instantiate class "org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.actions.ImportCSSStyleAction".
at org.eclipse.core.internal.registry.osgi.RegistryStrategyOSGI.throwException(RegistryStrategyOSGI.java:180)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.registry.osgi.RegistryStrategyOSGI.createExecutableExtension(RegistryStrategyOSGI.java:172)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.registry.ExtensionRegistry.createExecutableExtension(ExtensionRegistry.java:787)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.registry.ConfigurationElement.createExecutableExtension(ConfigurationElement.java:243)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.registry.ConfigurationElementHandle.createExecutableExtension(ConfigurationElementHandle.java:51)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerProxy.loadHandler(HandlerProxy.java:232)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerProxy.isEnabled(HandlerProxy.java:201)
at org.eclipse.core.commands.Command.isEnabled(Command.java:827)
at org.eclipse.core.commands.Command.setHandler(Command.java:934)

This bugs occurs because ImportCSSStyleHandler is missing in the checkin on March.7 2007.
Fixed.

traces.message: Plug-in "org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui" was unable to instantiate class "org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.actions.ImportCSSStyleAction".
